doc.title: ieat Makan Session: Cafe de Hong Kong
doc.text: Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO everyone/VB who/WP came/VBD to/TO support/VB our/PRP$ makan/NN session/NN !/. I/PRP think/VB I/PRP speak/VB for/IN everyone/NN who/WP attended/VBZ when/WRB I/PRP say/VB that/IN Francis/PRP did/VBD a/DT wonderful/JJ job/NN with/IN the/DT food/NN that/IN night/NN and/CC I/PRP am/VBP sure/JJ Cafe/NNP de/NNP Hong/NNP Kong/NNP has/VBZ won/VBN a/DT whole/JJ lot/NN of/IN new/JJ fans/NNS !/. So/RB if/IN you/PRP did/VBD attend/NN and/CC think/VB that/IN the/DT food/NN is/VBZ good/JJ ,/, do/VB show/VB your/PRP$ support/NN for/IN Francis/NN by/IN giving/VBG him/PRP a/DT good/JJ comment/NN on/IN the/DT blog/NN and/CC bring/VB your/PRP$ friends/NNS there/RB to/TO eat/VB !/.
